channel.title: Make an npc trade that doesnt trade yet [718]
channel.description: yeah how can i make an npc trade that doesnt trade already in a 718 nooby question :D thanks

item.title: Make an npc trade that doesnt trade yet [718]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“B0SS, post:5, topic:540718”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=659582.msg4410831#msg4410831 date=1393595951]

[quote author=B0SS link=topic=659582.msg4410830#msg4410830 date=1393595197]

[quote author=Pure_ link=topic=659582.msg4410828#msg4410828 date=1393592225]
As a shop keeper? Add a dialogue option and then show the respective store.
[/quote]ok i have a question cause i dont wanna make another thread, when i kill monsters and stuff they arent respawning? i always have to restart the server
[/quote]Add a task to re-spawn npcs every x unit of time.

[code=java]TaskManager.schedule(new Task(TIME) {

@Override
public void execute() {
for (Npc npc : NpcHandler.getNpcs()) {
if (npc.isDead() && npc.isRespawnable()) {
npc.respawn();
}
}
}
});[/code]
[/quote]i wish i knew how to code still, what do you mean add a new task?[/quote]Read this.

Read full topic
item.source: Make an npc trade that doesnt trade yet [718]

[code=java]TaskManager.schedule(new Task(TIME) {

@Override

for (Npc npc : NpcHandler.getNpcs()) {
if (npc.isDead() && npc.isRespawnable()) {
npc.respawn();

}[/code][/quote]i wish i knew how to code still, what do you mean add a new task?

As a shop keeper? Add a dialogue option and then show the respective store.
[/quote]ok i have a question cause i dont wanna make another thread, when i kill monsters and stuff they arent respawning? i always have to restart the server[/quote]Add a task to re-spawn npcs every x unit of time.
